messages.message:
Looks like `crafting-cyp` core-platform-service is repeatedly crashing
https://crafting-cyp.test.instabase.com/deployment-manager/dashboard/deployments/apps/v1/cor[…]ice/deployment-core-platform-service-6df94554d6-4zlrd (https://crafting-cyp.test.instabase.com/deployment-manager/dashboard/deployments/apps/v1/core-platform-service/deployment-core-platform-service-6df94554d6-4zlrd)

I see some errors where `ib_marketplace_admin` can’t perform some actions due to permission errors. Does this look familiar @Xindi Xu?
```2025-07-01T20:26:12.097425474Z stdout F 2025/07/01 20:26:12 ERROR utils/perms/helpers.go:40 -- [ACCESS_DENIED]: Requestor can't perform actions (SITE_APP:use_app) in SITE_APP (ib_marketplace_admin)```
yes, i'm actively working on this

Here's the thread: https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C01N7DV1137/p1751309223044309

Matt and I looked into this together and I think we might have found the root cause. I have a fix PR up (linked at the end of the thread)
